description:
With a history that dates back to 2006, the Distasio Law Firm PA in Tampa, Florida, has more than 14 years of providing unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout the greater Tampa Bay region and surrounding areas who suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

With an additional office in Wesley Chapel, the law firm has grown to become one of their area's premier legal practices for all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, including car accidents, nursing home abuse, medical malpractice, trucking accidents, premises liability and other preventable tragedies. Regardless of the cause of your suffering, you can rely on the firm's attorneys to fight hard to protect your rights and entitlements as they aggressively pursue the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve.

Over the course of their history, their lawyers have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for their plaintiff clients, including an award of more than $13 million for a victim who suffered brain damage and was in a coma due to a medication error.

The law firm's founder, attorney Scott Distasio, holds his board certification in trial law from The Florida Bar, and he has earned "Superb" client ratings on Avvo along with many top rankings and endorsements from his peers. This means you can expect to receive the highest level of representation possible for your legal challenge to improve the likelihood of a successful outcome.

To begin the process, you can contact the Distasio Law Firm PA by calling their office or visiting their website to schedule a free evaluation of your claim. They also offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
